page.title: 09Itchen Valley Flower Show
page.content: On a day in July the Itchen Valley Flower Show is held in the village hall.People from the local council are given entry forms,schedules and recipes.They live in different places Itchen Abbas,Martyr Worthy and Easton. The winner of section A wins the Challenge Cup.Section A is the vegetable group.The winner of section C which is cooking and making things wins the Rose Bowl and the runner up wins a Â£1.The winner of the flower arranging class wins a different cup. The person who enters the best rose of the show wins The Margaret Edmonds Memorial Challenge Cup.The Scatchard Challenge Cup is for the the child under 12 years with the highest number of points.The Stent Challenge Cup is for the child with the best exhibit in the 12-16 age group. By Samantha Lockyer
